```{r}
library(dplyr)
bio_data <- read.table("data/occurrence.txt",sep="\t",header=TRUE, fill = TRUE, quote = "", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```


```{r}
mass_data <- bio_data |>
  filter(stateProvince == "Massachusetts")

write.csv(mass_data, "mass_data.csv")
```
